casebody.data:
Dorothy ZELLERS
v.
April N. McNAIR and Transit Management of Charlotte, Inc. No. 575P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 4, 2005. George C. Piemonte, New York, NY, for Zellers. C. Grainger Pierce, Jr., Charlotte, Eric A. Rogers, for McNair. Robert D. McDonnell, for Transit Mgmt. of Charlotte.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 9th day of November 2004 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th day of May 2005."
